name: suggest_form_values
description: Intelligently suggest form field values based on learning patterns, form context, and field relationships. Uses context-aware inference, validation, and historical patterns to provide smart auto-fill suggestions.

formComponentId.description: The ID of the form component to provide suggestions for

fieldId.description: Specific field ID to get suggestions for. If not provided, suggests for all fields.

formContext.description: Context about the form for intelligent suggestions

formTitle.description: Title or name of the form

formUrl.description: URL of the form (for matching with similar forms)

formType.description: Type of form to tailor suggestions

otherFields.description: Current values of other fields for inference (e.g., {"country": "USA", "state": "CA"})

includeReasoning.description: Include reasoning for each suggestion (default: true)

includeAlternatives.description: Include alternative suggestions beyond primary (default: false)

examples.description: Get suggestions for a specific field
Get context-aware suggestions for a shipping form
Get suggestions with inference from other fields
